People still read this insane little man's books and watch his "shows"? Fucking sheeple. Don't you know a fucking fool dumbfuck when you read one? Apparently not since half the God Damn human race is HOPELESSLY BLIND AND IGNORANT. They follow what's told them WITHOUT CHECKING their facts. You fuckers that worship this INSANE "language expert" as yourselves INFUCKINGSANE. 

What's true is the U.S. is being pushed to socialism and by God if they ever try to push it the American people will PUSH BACK as we already are. Fucking WORTHLESS MOTHERFUCKING SOCIALIST/COMMUNIST SLIMEY SHITHOLERS....ALL need to ROT in HELL. 
A system proven NOT to work being embraced over and over by stupid ass fucking politicians. It's baffling. The TRUE seeking of power is the liberal socialist who will tell you what to do..what doctor to use...how to conduct your life..or go to jail or death if you do not obey. Yeah...Chomsky needs to roll over and DIE the mindless FUCK...and all the mindless fucks that are blind enough to believe this FOOL.
This has been a broadcast of THE TRUTH to THE FOOLS. Have a nice day.
End of line.
